19 template <class Base, class Interface = typename Base::InterfaceType>
20 class THierarchicalBase: public istd::TChangeDelegator<Base>
21 {
22 public:
23  typedef istd::TChangeDelegator<Base> BaseClass;
24 
25  THierarchicalBase();
26 
27  virtual void SetParentPtr(Interface* parentPtr);
28 
29  // pseudo-reimplemented (istd::TIHierarchical<Interface>)
30  virtual int GetHierarchicalFlags() const;
31  virtual int GetChildsCount() const;
32  virtual Interface* GetChild(int index) const;
33  virtual Interface* GetParent() const;
34 
35 protected:
36  Interface* m_parentPtr;
37 };

40 // public methods
41 
42 template <class Base, class Interface>
43 THierarchicalBase<Base, Interface>::THierarchicalBase()
44 {
45  m_parentPtr = NULL;
46 }
47 
48 
49 template <class Base, class Interface>
50 void THierarchicalBase<Base, Interface>::SetParentPtr(Interface* parentPtr)
51 {
52  m_parentPtr = parentPtr;
53 
54  istd::IChangeable* changeablePtr = dynamic_cast<istd::IChangeable*>(parentPtr);
55  if (changeablePtr){
56  BaseClass::SetSlavePtr(changeablePtr);
57  }
58 }
59 
60 
61 // pseudo-reimplemented (istd::TIHierarchical<Interface>)
62 
63 template <class Base, class Interface>
64 int THierarchicalBase<Base, Interface>::GetHierarchicalFlags() const
65 {
66  return BaseClass::HF_CHILDS_SUPPORTED | BaseClass::HF_PARENT_SUPPORTED;
67 }
68 
69 
70 template <class Base, class Interface>
71 int THierarchicalBase<Base, Interface>::GetChildsCount() const
72 {
73  return 0;
74 }
75 
76 
77 template <class Base, class Interface>
78 Interface* THierarchicalBase<Base, Interface>::GetChild(int /*index*/) const
79 {
80  return NULL;
81 }
82 
83 
84 template <class Base, class Interface>
85 Interface* THierarchicalBase<Base, Interface>::GetParent() const
86 {
87  return m_parentPtr;
88 }
